about_the_game:
Use corpses of your enemies as weapons. Find keys to open doors. Use tricks to be faster. One bad move and you are dead, but you have as many lives as you need to go through 666 levels to hell. The final boss, The Devil itself awaits you. Try to fight him if you dare...

Vampire vs Devil is a spooky 2D action-arcade platformer with a pixelart retro graphics similar to the classic 8-bit gaming consoles (especially like the NES) and inspired by games from that era (80s, 90s). Your goal in this indie game is to beat the enemies and finish each from the 666 levels. Throughout your adventure you will have to fight and defeat bosses to move on.

Features:

  • 666 Levels

  • 12 Worlds

  • Mysterious Story

  • Detailed retro graphics

  • Super responsive gameplay

  • Secrets

  • Tricks

  • Bosses

  • Achievements

  • Play with the Controller, Keyboard or Mouse

It's a horror side-scroller that is scary but in a funny cartoon way. It uses pixelart, which is an old school art style in which every pixel matters.

Vampire vs Devil - there can be only one survivor. Who will win this fight?

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Turkish*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
